p: Lastly, the anti-nociceptive peptide nocistatin, which is produced by neuronal cells and neutrophils, has been shown to reduce the speed of activation (49%), amplitude (18%) and the rate of desensitization (32%) of the rASIC3 transient current [ 211]. Therefore, it is possible that at least some of the anti-nociceptive effect of nocistatin is through inhibition of ASIC function.
